training.location: Mobilio West (Town Centre Park) - Grid D
training.focus: Match preparation and sharpness after winter break

highlights: Good session - all players attended except twins Eunjun and Yejun
Team looking sharp after winter break
Focus on match preparation for Saturday

training.notes: Great training session yesterday! All players ready for tomorrow's match.

match.preparation_focus: First match of 2026! Build on our winning momentum from before the break. All 14 players available - full squad strength!

captains.duties: Lead warm-ups • Take set pieces • Guide positions • Motivate teammates
captains.training_update: Captains will be announced before the match

goalkeepers.duties: One GK in goal per 30-minute half • Non-GK plays field • Switch at half-time
goalkeepers.rotation_note: Continuing fair rotation across the squad

sideline_layout.keeper_spot: Near coach for quick switch at half

captains.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)

goalkeepers.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)

notes.arrival: Arrive by 10:30 AM (30 min early for warm-up)
notes.coach: First match of 2026! All 14 players available and ready to continue our winning momentum. Good training session yesterday - all players attended except the twins Eunjun and Yejun. Everyone available for tomorrow's HOME match vs RMSC U11B6D3 at Miller Park West, kickoff 11:00am. Wear WHITE kit. Let's start the new year with a WIN!
notes.training_recap: Jan 8: Good training session with 12 players (twins Eunjun and Yejun absent). Team sharp and ready for match day.
notes.match_update: MATCH DAY TOMORROW: Saturday Jan 10 at 11:00am vs RMSC U11B6D3 at Miller Park West (HOME). Arrive by 10:30 AM. Wear WHITE kit.
notes.this_week: New year, full squad, winning momentum! All 14 players available for tomorrow's match. Let's go!
achievements: Sept 13 vs Millwall: Score First Goal and Team Work Goal
Sept 20 vs PCFC Wolf Pack: Excellent second half comeback
Sept 27 vs Swansea: Andy E first goal! Travis C 2 goals (beautiful free kick!)
Oct 4 vs Tones: Best defensive performance! Yejun K and David C standout games
Oct 18 vs Soccer Stars: Dominated possession 25 min (1st half) + 15 min (2nd half)
Andrew N solid defence, Ethan G & Andy E excellent versatility
Oct 23: Crossing mastery - attack & defence situations
Oct 24: Extended 2-hour practice session - game changer!
Oct 25: FIRST WIN! 4-2 victory with Adam K hat-trick & Ethan G goal
Oct 25: Seven players best games - Yejun K, Rhodri W, Adam K, Andrew N, Niko D, David C, Owen H
Oct 25: Travis C & Andrew N excellent first-time goalkeepers
Nov 1: Match vs RMSC cancelled - flooded fields
Nov 6-7: Two excellent training sessions - finishing focus

Nov 8: TEN players standout performances - Yejun K, Niko D, Rafael H, David C, Andy E, Travis C, Minh-An D, Andrew N, Ethan G, Rhodri W
Nov 8: Excellent defensive organization - competed strongly for full match
Nov 8: Niko D & Rafael H first-time goalkeepers performed well
Nov 15: SECOND WIN! 4-2 vs Sheffield United - Niko D penalty, Adam K brace, Travis C goal
Nov 15: Andy E showed character - missed penalty but assisted Travis C's goal
Nov 15: Adam K scoring twice with smart positioning - clinical hunter!
Nov 15: Rafael H hit post twice - creating quality chances
Nov 15: Team resilience despite wasted chances - winning mentality!
Nov 22: THIRD WIN! 5-2 vs Middlesbrough - Travis C x2, Rafael H first goal, Ethan G, Andy E
Nov 22: Travis C stunning corner kick goal - Corner Kick Magic!
Nov 22: Rafael H BEST MATCH - first goal of the season!
Nov 22: Rhodri W clean sheet first half, Adam K crucial saves second half
Nov 22: Dominant defense - Yejun K, Andrew N, Rhodri W excellent
Nov 22: Four different scorers - Shared Glory achievement!
Dec 6: FOURTH WIN! 6-2 vs Blue Lightning - Travis C hat-trick, Owen H breakthrough goal!
Dec 6: Owen H first goal of the season!
Dec 6: Ethan G great saves as goalkeeper!
Oct Player of Month: Andrew N
